name: AddServiceFieldOption
description:
Create a new option for a custom field in PagerDuty services.

This tool is used to create a new option for a specified custom field in the PagerDuty services. It should be called when you want to extend the available options for a specific field. Requires `custom_fields.write` OAuth scope.

parameters.name: field_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom field where the new option will be added. This is required to specify which field you are modifying.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: Specify the version of the API to use by setting the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the request body, typically 'application/json'.

parameters.name: field_option_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the new field option data, including type and value. It must match the expected field data type and be unique within the field.

data_type.description: The kind of data represented by this option. Must match the Field's `data_type`.

value.description: The value of the field option. Must be unique within the field.

data.description: The data content of the field option.

field_option.description: An option for a custom field. Can only be applied to fields with a `field_type` of `single_value_fixed` or `multi_value_fixed`.
